concept.title: Accounting Impact of Internal Transfers
concept.abstract: The Transaction Summary related list on the sales order's Receipt record displays the Accounting impact of the related transfers between business groups.

conbody.p: Journal a debit to the Cash account:

ul.li: Debit field is populated in the amount of the Total on the Receipt.
GL Account is populated with the value of the Deposit Account field on the Receipt record.
Date is populated with the value in the Posted Date on the Receipt.

conbody.p: Journal a credit to the Income/Revenue account:

ul.li: Credit field is populated in the amount of the Total on the Receipt Line for the correct item.
GL Account is populated with the value of the Income Account field on the Item record.
Date is populated with the value in the Posted Date on the Receipt.

conbody.p: Journal a credit to the Transfers Payable Account of Business Group 2:

ul.li: Credit field is populated in the amount of the Total on the Receipt Line for the correct item.
GL Account is populated with the value of the Transfers Payable Account field on the Item's related Business Group record.
Date is populated with the value in the Posted Date on the Receipt.

conbody.p: Journal a debit to the Transfers Receivable Account:

ul.li: Debit field is populated in the amount of the Total on the Receipt Line for the correct Item.
GL Account is populated with the value of the Transfers Receivables Account field on the Item's associated Business Group record.
Date is populated with the value in the Posted Date on the Receipt.

conbody.p: Journal a credit to the Income/Revenue account:

ul.li: Credit field is populated in the amount of the Total on the Receipt Line for the correct Item.
GL Account is populated with the value of the Income Account field on the Item record.
Date is populated with the value in the Posted Date on the Receipt.
